name: Smoldering Pearl
description: A crystallization of a Pyro Hypostasis that constantly emits heat.  Even the burning flames shall one day grow cold, and even the ashen firewoodcan will itself back into a raging blaze. It must then be the will of theworld that Pyro Hypostases should constantly cool down and heat up, much likethe universe teems with endless life... until the fated darkness shall one daydescend and bring it all to naught.
